description.overView: This Nutrient feast is enriched with three superstar ingredients: apple, beetroot, and carrots to support your health. This miracle drink contains zero white sugar and is a better alternative to traditional country sugar. Treat your health to a tasty blend of nutrients. Our Nutrimix is best suited for young mothers concerned about their children’s eating habits and adults looking for an instant energy boost.
description.keyIngredients: Fresh apples, beetroot, carrots, cashews, almonds, country sugar, cardamom, barley malt, and milk solids.
description.healthBenefits: Rich in vitamins, providing essential nutrients to support growth and development. Packed with energy-boosting ingredients for sustained energy throughout the day.
description.packaging: Packaged in a PET jar with sealed caps, ensuring freshness and ease of use.
description.directionForUse: Add 1.5 tablespoons of Nutrimix to 200ml of hot milk, mix well, and enjoy. No need to boil!
description.tasteAndFlavour: Offers a delightful blend of sweet and earthy flavours, combining the natural sweetness of apple, beetroot, and carrot with the nutty richness of nuts.
description.productionProcess: Grinding fresh apples, beetroot, and carrots to perfection, mixed with nuts and country sugar for a delicious blend.
description.sourceAndSustainability: Clean label product, no additives, no preservatives, no artificial colours, 100% natural.
description.readyToMix: Convenient powdered form that mixes quickly and easily.

description.overView: Enjoy the rich and comforting taste of our Ragi Chocolate Mix guilt-free. Each sip satisfies your chocolate cravings while nourishing your body.
description.keyIngredients: Sprouted Ragi, Cocoa, Country Sugar, Milk Solids.
description.healthBenefits: This delicious treat not only satisfies your chocolate cravings but also provides a wealth of health benefits. It's gluten-free, rich in antioxidants and calcium, and is sure to enhance your mood. Enjoy a guilt-free indulgence that nourishes both body and soul.
description.packaging: Packaged in a PET jar with sealed caps, ensuring freshness and ease of use.
description.directionForUse: Add 1.5 tablespoons to 200ml of hot milk, mix, and enjoy – no need to boil!
description.tasteAndFlavour: Experience the rich, chocolaty goodness guilt-free, complemented by the unmistakable aroma of cocoa. Our Ragi Chocolate Mix offers a delightful balance of flavor and nutrition in every sip.
description.productionProcess: We begin with freshly sprouted Ragi, which is then combined with high-quality cocoa and country sugar. The mixture is ground into a fine powder to ensure the perfect blend of taste and nutrition.
description.sourceAndSustainability: Clean label product, no additives, no preservatives, no artificial colors, 100% natural.
description.readyToMix: Convenient powdered form that mixes quickly and easily.

description.overView: A 100% nutrient feast enriched with the superstar ingredient, Carrot supports your health. This miracle drink contains zero white sugar and is a better alternative of traditional country sugar. Treat your health with a healthy and tasty blend of nutrients. Our Nutrimix is best suited for young mothers concerned about their children’s eating habits and adults looking for an instant energy boost.
description.keyIngredients: Fresh Carrots, Cashews, Almonds, Country Sugar, Cardamom, Barley Malt, Milk Solids.
description.healthBenefits: Carrot mix is rich in vitamins, providing essential nutrients to support your child’s growth and development. It is packed with energy-boosting ingredients, providing sustained energy throughout the day and supporting your child’s active lifestyle.
description.packaging: Packaged in a PET jar with sealed caps, ensuring freshness and ease of use.

description.tasteAndFlavour: Carrot offers a delightful blend of sweet and earthy flavors, combining the natural sweetness of fresh Carrots with the nutty richness of nuts and the subtle sweetness of country sugar.
description.productionProcess: The process begins by grinding fresh carrots to perfection. This vibrant ingredient is mixed with nuts and country sugar, ensuring a delicious and nutritious blend that your child will love.
description.sourceAndSustainability: Clean label product, no additives, no preservatives, no artificial colors, 100% natural.
description.readyToMix: Convenient powdered form that mixes quickly and easily.

description.overView: Our Turmeric Milk Mix blends the strong flavors and bright colors of turmeric, pepper, cinnamon, dry ginger, and country sugar. Enjoy a soothing cup of our Turmeric Latte to elevate your everyday routine. It's a delectable blend that satisfies the senses and replenishes the body.
description.keyIngredients: Turmeric, Pepper, Cinnamon, Dry Ginger, Fennel, Cardamom, Country Sugar.
description.healthBenefits: Our Turmeric Milk mix blend is not only delicious, but also beneficial for your well-being. Turmeric, known for its anti-inflammatory properties, is combined with pepper to enhance absorption, while cinnamon and ginger add warmth and spice. This blend is rich in antioxidants and natural goodness, supporting immune health and overall wellness.
description.packaging: Turmeric Milk mix is packaged in a sleek stand-up pouch for on-the-go freshness.
description.directionForUse: To prepare our Turmeric milk mix, simply add 1 tablespoon to 200 ml of boiling milk. Allow it to boil for 2 minutes, then stir well and enjoy the rich aroma and flavor.
description.tasteAndFlavour: The taste and flavor profile includes earthy notes of turmeric complemented by the warmth of cinnamon, while the subtle heat from pepper and ginger adds depth to each sip. Sweetened with country sugar, our blend strikes the perfect balance between sweetness and spice, tantalizing your taste buds with every cup.
description.productionProcess: Our Turmeric Milk Mix is created by carefully blending quality ingredients to ensure optimal flavor and health benefits.
description.sourceAndSustainability: Clean label product, no additives, no preservatives, no artificial colors, 100% natural.
description.readyToMix: Convenient powdered form that mixes quickly and easily.

description.overView: Enjoy the ideal combination of spice and crunch with our Chili Cashews. This flavorful snack not only satisfies your taste buds but also provides your body with essential nutrients. Each bite offers the rich, buttery taste of premium cashews, roasted to perfection and coated in a bold chili seasoning for an extra kick.

Key Benefits.Nutrient-Rich: Packed with heart-healthy fats, plant-based protein, and essential minerals such as magnesium, copper, and zinc, cashews are a nutritional powerhouse.
Key Benefits.Boosts Immunity: Fortified with zinc from cashews and the antioxidant power of chili's vitamin C, this snack helps strengthen your immune system.
Key Benefits.Supports Heart Health: The monounsaturated fats in cashews help maintain healthy cholesterol levels, while capsaicin from chili peppers promotes anti-inflammatory benefits.
Key Benefits.Aids in Weight Management: With a combination of protein, fiber, and capsaicin, these cashews help keep you full and rev up your metabolism, making them an excellent option for weight control.
Key Benefits.Brain and Bone Health: Rich in magnesium and copper, these cashews support cognitive function and help maintain strong bones.
Key Benefits.Energy-Boosting: With a perfect balance of healthy fats and protein, these cashews provide sustained energy for your busy day.
Key Benefits.Gut-Friendly: The fiber in cashews promotes digestive health, while the chili stimulates digestion, optimizing gut function.

description.overView: Experience the timeless flavor and wholesome goodness of our Salted Almonds. This simple yet satisfying snack combines premium, crunchy almonds with a delicate touch of sea salt. Carefully selected and lightly roasted to perfection, these almonds offer a balanced blend of savory flavor and nutritious benefits, making them the perfect go-to snack for any time of day.

Key Features and Benefits.Nutrient-Dense: Rich in heart-healthy monounsaturated fats, providing 6 grams of protein per serving, packed with vitamins and minerals.
Key Features and Benefits.Supports Heart Health: Naturally high in antioxidants, contributes to maintaining optimal blood pressure levels and reducing bad cholesterol.
Key Features and Benefits.Weight Management and Satiety: Keeps you fuller for longer, thanks to their combination of healthy fats, fiber, and protein.
Key Features and Benefits.Brain-Boosting Power: Supports cognitive function, memory, and mental clarity.
Key Features and Benefits.Bone Health: Loaded with calcium and magnesium, excellent for maintaining strong bones and teeth.
Key Features and Benefits.Energy-Boosting Snack: Provides a perfect blend of protein, fiber, and fats to keep you fueled throughout the day.
Key Features and Benefits.Perfect On-the-Go Snack: Conveniently portioned and easy to carry, ideal for quick energy boosts.

description.overView: Elevate your snack experience with our Chili Peanuts. Our premium peanuts are perfectly roasted to enhance their natural flavor and then seasoned with a carefully crafted blend of chili spices, creating a tantalizing mix of heat and crunch that’s both satisfying and nutritious.
description.nutrientPackedGoodness: Loaded with heart-healthy monounsaturated fats and a rich source of plant-based protein.
description.spicyMetabolismBoost: Capsaicin helps boost metabolism and enhance fat burning.
description.Heart Health Support: Helps maintain healthy blood pressure and cholesterol levels.
description.Perfect for Weight Management: Protein and fiber help keep you full longer, reducing the urge to overeat.
description.Rich in Antioxidants: Vitamin E and chili antioxidants protect cells from oxidative stress.
description.Brain and Bone Health: Rich in magnesium for brain function and bone density.
description.Sustained Energy and Satiety: Perfect balance of healthy fats, protein, and fiber to keep you energized.

description.overView: A delicious blend of six nutrient-rich seeds, perfect for snacking or adding to your meals.
description.keyFeatures: Rich in fiber, protein, and essential fatty acids.
description.healthBenefits: Supports heart health, digestion, and provides sustained energy.
